notes.primary_gate: Primary acceptance uses the large-tree fixture and strict thresholds. Passing this gate is required for browse responsiveness sign-off.
notes.secondary_gate: Secondary acceptance is a fast tiny-fixture sanity check and cannot replace the primary large-fixture gate.

policy.write_mode: Primary profile defaults to no-write mode. Capture an additional --write-mode run for dual-mode evidence before final release sign-off.

primary_large_no_write.expectations: Run both cold and warm checks on this profile. Cold validation should start from a non-hydrated browse path.

secondary_tiny_fast.expectations: Use this profile for fast local/CI checks only. Do not use it as final evidence for root-flow closure.
